title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 622 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 13, 2013

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 622




On Thursday, June 13, 2013, the President signed into law:
S. 622, the "Animal Drug and Animal Generic Drug User Fee Reauthorization Act of 2013‚Äù, which reauthorizes the collection and spending of user fees by the Food and Drug Administration for brand-name and generic animal drugs.
